community_water_challenges:
Lots of challenges are facing us, ranging from frequently falling ill from lack of proper sanitation services to major ones like closure of community facilities such as schools, reduced service in health facilities.
More often food production and consumption reduces too.
community_water_suggestions:
To educate our population on the important of consuming clean water and making sure quantity matters over quality and where is possible to improve quality too,by prioritizing market based sanitation services.
Also to make sure the national government come up with policies that improve water services to all households and sanitation services beyond home such as schools and hospitals.
To educate all stakeholders in particular families to boil their water in case they could not afford water treatment items.
